Package org.ninit.models.bm25

Class Summary
BM25BooleanQuery Query based in BM25 family ranking functions.
BM25BooleanScorer BM25BooleanScorer, calculates the total relevance value based in a boolean expression.
BM25BooleanWeight Weight BM25 class, implements public Scorer scorer(IndexReader reader) throws IOException
and public Explanation explain(IndexReader reader, int doc) throws IOException
Query weight is not used in this BM25 implementation.
BM25Parameters Parameters needed to calculate the BM25 relevance.
BM25Similarity Similarity for BM25 ranking functions family.
BM25SingleBooleanScorer BM25SingleBooleanScorer, calculates the total relevance value based boolean expression, that has just one common operator (AND, OR, NOT) for all terms.
BM25TermScorer Calculate the relevance value of a single term applying BM25 function ranking.
